thread.title: Top-Seed Comets Ready To Roll Through Postseason
thread.title_full: Top-Seed Comets Ready To Roll Through Postseason

title: Top-Seed Comets Ready To Roll Through Postseason
text:
Top-Seed Comets Ready To Roll Through Postseason Tools 
Story Published: Oct 20, 2015 at 6:48 AM EDT Story Updated: Oct 20, 2015 at 6:53 AM EDT 
Sandy Creek has a history of doing well on the football field this time of year. The number-one-seed Comets are living up to that legacy after winning five straight games. No strangers to the Carrier Dome, they begin their postseason hosting eighth-seed Mount Markham Friday night. Watch the video for Mel Busler's preview.
